DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect anticoagulant treatment live-birth rate woman history least two continuous unexplained miscarriage thrombophilia . It also compare two method treatment aspirin aspirin plus heparin .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Aspirin Compare With Heparin Plus Aspirin Recurrent Pregnancy Loss Treatment
DOC.criteria: unexplained recurrent miscarriage , woman previous venous arterial thromboembolism heterozygous homozygous mutation FV Leiden G1691A , prothrombin gene G20210A ( FII G20210A ) , methyltetrahydrofolate reductase C677T ( MTHFR C677T ) abnormal karyotype partner , uterine cervical anatomical disorder pelvic ultrasonography hysteroscopy , abnormal ovary abnormal endocrine test .
